about_the_game:
The Krow

A strange phenomenon spreads throughout the kingdom. Adventurers and sellswords, suddenly and seemingly at random, as if possessed, start to call themselves "Krow". They immediately venture out to seek danger without any quest or reward. They certainly don't seem to be in control of their own actions, and soon they dissappear as if into thin air never to return.

Select your Krows

You must choose your Krow, they all have different abilities and capabilities, some are strong, some are weak, some have great affinity to magic, others none, perhaps you must make do with weaklings?

Level Up
Teach them abilities as you level them up, equipment and relics can be found by exploring the world, or why not just loot them from the orcs, goblins, trolls and various other monsters you encounter around the world.

To Battle!

Each item you equip automatically acts during combat to provide their benefits. They may be passive or cooldown based. Items may interact with each other in various ways. Your sword may deal 10 damage every 2 seconds, and your shield may block 10 damage every 3 seconds, maybe you find a relic that increases all block values by 5 every time you attack?

Not only swords and shields, it's magic!

The game features numerous weapons and tools to use to defeat your enemies. Whether you wish your Krow to be a sword master, sorcerer, magic swordman... perhaps Followers of Krow will not dissapoint...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 470
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K or AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 6600XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Possess yourself an adventurer in this roguelike autobattler! Train their bodies, teach them powerful abilities, explore the world of fantasy to find them powerful equipment, ancient runes and relics. Seek out your enemies and... whether they die is up to Krow.
